episodes.title: Are You Being Controlled By Cult-Leader Parents?
episodes.description: Hey Heathens! Serious question for you today... Can you spot harmful control tactics in your relationships that mirror classic behaviors of cult leaders? Being in a controlling relationship with your family or a significant other comes at a major cost and can leave a profound and negative impact on your mental health, quality of life, and overall wellbeing. Unfortunately, it's easy to get sucked into the loop of repeating toxic relationship cycles we witnessed during childhood and as adults we find that those relationships can feel eerily similar. In this episode, I break down controlling and authoritarian cult behavior and demonstrate what it could look like in your every day life. Resources from this episode include Dr. Steven Hassan's BITE Model of Authoritarian Control which you can download for free on his website https://freedomofmind.com/cult-mind-control/bite-model/ and all other material used for this episode can be found below: https://www.thehotline.org https://www.watchmojo.com/articles/top-10-mind-control-techniques-used-by-cults https://www.newyorker.com/magazine/2021/07/12/what-makes-a-cult-a-cult https://thriveworks.com/blog/psychological-coercion-dark-traits-emotional-safety-relationships/ Join my Anti-Cult Club channel to get access to exclusive perks and chaos: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqfiV3C_ALO-kdynhhm876Q/join #cult #cultleader #cultbehavior #cultsurvivor #religioustrauma #childhoodtrauma #cptsd #ptsd #rts #exfundie #exjw #exmo #healthyrelationships #toxicfamily

episodes.title: Doomsday Cult Pt. 2 {ft. Micki M.}
episodes.description: Hey Heathens! Welcome back for part 2 of Micki's story! Before you dig into this one, make sure you're caught up to speed with part 1 so you don't miss important context and insider information she shares there. Show Micki some support with a like and comment on the video, and hey, the algorithm loves it too! ;) ----------------- Want to be even more involved in the supportive and entertaining [Cult]ure Shock community? Join the Anti-Cult Club channel to get access to exclusive content (aka things the general public doesn't need to see lol)! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqfiV3C_ALO-kdynhhm876Q/join ------------------ Micki spent the better part of 3 decades as a dedicated Jehovah's Witness but what she experienced during that time was both horrific and infuriating. Many classic cult tactics are tightly woven in the fabric of the Jehovah's Witness culture and Micki does a phenomenal job unpacking and clearly explaining just how manipulative and cohesive it is towards members. Since leaving the religion a few years ago, Micki has been an outspoken advocate against the harmful practices of the JW's which is incredibly MEANINGFUL work yet it receives a ton of backlash and hate from active group members. Soooo....please drop a comment to show love and support of the wonderful work she's doing and go follow her on socials!! Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/apostatebarbie TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@apostatebarbie?_t=8jX7K98vQJG&_r=1 Sources mentioned in the video: https://jwfacts.com http://www.youtube.com/@altworldly -------------

episodes.title: 2 Girls | 1 Cult {ft. Jessalyn G.}
episodes.description: Hey Heathens- I hope your week was amazing! SUBSCRIBE for weekly episode and I'll love you forever and a day! You can watch the episode on Youtube here: https://youtu.be/vVYv1wo5jBk ----- It's been 20 FREAKING YEARS since I've seen or spoken to Jessalyn and we wasted no time breaking out some funny and traumatizing memories. You'll get to see an absolute blast from the past via OLD AF pictures of our youth that I found in the hidden vaults (the top of my closet under huge stacks of books). Jessalyn is a childhood friend and teammate from my homeschool volleyball days circa 2003-ish. We were both labeled as SUPER rebellious and told we were bad influences on the other girls. You'll be shocked at what we did to get those horrendous labels. We were raised in slightly different variations of a controlling fundamentalist group and I'm honestly so proud we both managed to escape and become the strong, outspoken, rebellious, and hilarious women we are today. Cheers to all the other Jezebels like us out there!

episodes.title: Unholy Secrets {ft. Jess S.}
episodes.description: Hey Heathens! On this episode I’m joined by my lovely and hilarious guest, Jess, who grew up in the Pentecostal Holiness church. Jess’ interview is packed full of wisdom, heartbreak, and many moments of humor as she recounts her own experience of growing up in an unsuspecting cult. She sheds light on many untold secrets and cover-ups that tarnished her youthful innocence and continue to impact innocent people in the Pentecostal Holiness Church. Our conversation left me feeling more inspired to live this life as a loud, proud, and free woman. 💜 Watch the episode on Youtube: https://studio.youtube.com/video/uqmtMYr9Njg/edit ---------------------------------- Resources mentioned in this episode: NYC area sliding scale therapy: www.safehorizon.org Nationwide sliding scale therapy: ▫️betterhelp.com ▫️try.talkspace.com DV/SA/CSA support hotline and chat: 🔺RAINN.org 800-656-HOPE

episodes.title: HBO: Let Us Prey {ft. Eric S. of the Preacher Boys Podcast}
episodes.description: Hey Heathens! Where are my fellow documentary peeps at?? You can watch "Let Us Prey: A Ministry of Scandals", on HBO Max or anywhere Investigation Discovery is playing. The 4 part docuseries follows the stories of several individuals who have left Independent Fundamental Baptist Churches. The victims have experienced horrific things while in them both as children and adults. The coverup and denial of their experiences has gone too far and for too long... You can watch the full episode on Youtube here: https://youtu.be/qE_8Lcma7Xg ----------------------- Eric Skwarczynski began his career as a professional videographer in 2013. Since then, his work has taken him across over 20 states and 13 countries, allowing him to develop into a skilled storyteller. Now, Eric is utilizing his talents and abilities to shed light on critical issues surrounding mental, physical, and sexual abuse within Independent Baptist Churches. His podcast, Preacher Boys, launched in January 2020, and has garnered nearly 2.5 million downloads, and the accompanying YouTube channel has accumulated 3,000,000+ views. Eric’s work has found its way into mainstream media, being featured on platforms like Peacock and the CBC. He was most recently featured in the four-part documentary series, Let Us Prey, which premiered on Investigation Discovery and hit #7 on the most-watched series on HBO Max. In addition to the success of Preacher Boys, Eric recently introduced a second YouTube channel, Film School’d – which features in-depth interviews with directors, actors, writers, Academy Award-winning FX artists, and other luminaries in the film industry. Casting Application: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfzlvQhC4mrFt09AC_lDcsLYlTNxNyOtiG_gA1vgBDW7N7_yQ/viewform Eric's Socials Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUnhn-4KoLWr0ffbPjMf-gQ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/preacherboysdoc/ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/preacherboysdoc/ Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@preacherboyspod Twitter (X) https://twitter.com/preacherboysdoc Apple Podcasts:https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/preacher-boys-podcast/id1493726980 Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/5xZpDGKzOzjBuhRFUhFAM9?si=1d340858588f4054

episodes.title: Wicked Crimes {ft. Angela W.}
episodes.description: Hey Heathens! Hope you're having a fantastic week! You can watch the full video on Youtube here: https://youtu.be/aUIWb3N3Ahs ___ As a young teenager, Angela was groomed by a former youth pastor and covert narcissist, now serving a life sentence. Unfortunately, Angela and several other young girls did not escape without life long scars including ptsd and religious trauma syndrome (rts) However, Angela and these other brave women are the reason he is behind bars which has protected so many others from his horrific crimes. We also dig into other things like how religious trauma can sneak up on you long after you've left the environment and the heavy truth that ALL church goers (past and present) need to hear. Angela did an absolutely beautiful job sharing her vulnerable story of pain, trauma, hope and healing. I am grateful she has shared it with all of us here. Go show your love and support to her by visiting Angela's super cute metaphysical IG shop: https://instagram.com/therestlessspiritvintage?igshid=MzMyNGUyNmU2YQ==

episodes.title: Pray The Gay Away {ft. Mekael J.}
episodes.description: Hey Heathens, thanks for being here! In this episode of [Cult]ure Shock, I had the pleasure of speaking with Mekael J., an ex-Mormon woman who left the church at age 37 when she came out as gay. We had an eye-opening conversation about her journey to embracing her authentic self and leaving a religion that treats homosexuality as a sin and worthy of excommunication. We also dug into the challenges that come with recovering from religion including losing family, how to reparent yourself, and the feelings of isolation and loneliness often attached. Mekael shared many of her personal experiences with me while offering valuable advice for others in similar situations. This episode is a must-listen if you or someone you know is struggling with leaving a religion that no longer serves you/them. Follow Mekael on IG: @pearl_np88 Helpful resources: Suicide and Crisis Lifeline: Dial or Text 988 (Available for everyone for free, 24/7) Book Of Separation: https://www.amazon.com/The-Book-of-Separation-audiobook/dp/B076KST3HH/ref=sr_1_1?crid=36FNKGNNZJ675&keywords=book+of+separation&qid=1699474722&sprefix=book+of+separation%2Caps%2C123&sr=8-1 Embracing Uncertainty: https://www.amazon.com/Embracing-Uncertainty-Breakthrough-Methods-Achieving/dp/B07XB39KM1/ref=sr_1_1?crid=KCNJ03LLZ2KU&keywords=embracing+uncertainty&qid=1699474786&s=audible&sprefix=embracing+uncertainty%2Caudible%2C126&sr=1-1 How To Do The Work: https://www.amazon.com/How-Do-Work-Recognize-Patterns/dp/B092394734/ref=sr_1_1?crid=3L9CC7GYKX64F&keywords=how+to+do+the+work&qid=1699474819&s=audible&sprefix=how+to+do+the+work%2Caudible%2C117&sr=1-1 When Religion Hurts You: https://www.amazon.com/When-Religion-Hurts-You-High-Control/dp/B0CHDMFN4M/ref=sr_1_1?crid=JH5Q49WILYBB&keywords=when+religion+hurts+you&qid=1699474853&s=audible&sprefix=when+religion+hurts+you%2Caudible%2C124&sr=1-1 Complex PTSD Workbook: https://www.amazon.com/Complex-PTSD-Workbook-Mind-Body-Regaining/dp/B0849YRJ1X/ref=sr_1_1?crid=1K644SU3MPFEO&keywords=complex+ptsd+workbook&qid=1699474882&s=audible&sprefix=complex+ptsd+workbook%2Caudible%2C117&sr=1-1 Huberman Labs Podcast: https://www.hubermanlab.com/podcast Ketamine Episode: https://www.hubermanlab.com/episode/ketamine-benefits-and-risks-for-depression-ptsd-and-neuroplasticity The Science of Emotions and Relationships Episode: https://www.hubermanlab.com/episode/the-science-of-emotions-relationships LQBTQ Mormons, Families, and Friends: Affirmation.org Ready to Leave the Mormon Church: https://quitmormon.com
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: The Deadly Cost Of Biblical Faith
episodes.description:
Today on Culture Shock with Kendra, you’ll hear the powerful story of Shannon Au who was featured on Investigation Discovery's 'American Monster' in January 2023. Shannon endured spiritual abuse,  church hurt, and cptsd in the years leading up to  her mom’s brutal de*th in 2002. 

Shannon speaks out about the haunting memory of her mother's k*ller, who deliberately leveraged his position as a police officer and church leader to inflict years of physical and psychological tort*re on her and her family.

We will explore the details of the case and the potential early release of the ex-cop who was convicted of the m*rder. However, our main focus is on Shannon's story and the dangers of religious ab*se within churches and families and spiritual abuse healing. 

For more impactful stories like Shannon's and to stay up to date on new videos, hit subscribe! Thank you for supporting our voices.

If you or someone you know is experiencing DV or ab*se of any kind, there are resources to help. Believe victims and advocate for them.

The nationwide Hotline provides the following services:

• Crisis intervention
• DV education
• Safety planning
• Directly connects callers to Service Providers such as local shelters and provides referrals to agencies that provide legal, economic self-sufficiencyand other related services

You can reach the Hotline at 1-800-799-SAFE (7233) or TTY 1-800-787-3224 or (206) 518-9361 (Video Phone Only for Deaf Callers). The Hotline provides service referrals to agencies in all 50 states, Puerto Rico, & Guam.
Sources and Press:
American Monster "Gone Hunting", Season 9, Episode 10 on Discovery Plus and Amazon Prime

- https://www.kitv.com/news/big-island-ex-cop-serving-time-for-brutally-murdering-his-wife-could-be-set-free/article_bcac09be-55a8-11ed-8429-5b3f1f4802f8.html
